name: super no touchy flooro
description:
Super No Touchy Flooro is a platformer where your goal is straightforward: don't touch the floor, and make it to the end of each level. Journey across 4 worlds of challenging parkour, discovering new power-ups and traps along the way, and just maybe, at the end of it all, you'll be able to touch the floor again...

Play the game here, install it below, or find the source code on GitHub.
